html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10022024-09-09PS
ActAn Act to amend certain Acts and to make certain consequential amendments (firearms)
SubjectOrder Fixing October 1, 2024 as the Day on Which Certain Provisions of An Act to amend certain Acts and to make certain consequential amendments (firearms) Come into Force
PrecisOrder fixing October 1, 2024, as the day on which certain provisions of An Act to amend certain Acts and to make certain consequential amendments (firearms) COME INTO FORCE in order to transfer the authority for the issuance, revocation and renewal of Authorizations to Carry for the protection of life from the Chief Firearms Officer to the Commissioner of Firearms.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order fixing October 1, 2024, as the day on which certain provisions of An Act to amend certain Acts and to make certain consequential amendments (firearms) COME INTO FORCE in order to transfer the authority for the issuance, revocation and renewal of Authorizations to Carry for the protection of life from the Chief Firearms Officer to the Commissioner of Firearms.
